task.title: How to make a cup of coffee

context.p: You are in a well equipped kitchen with a packet of coffee bags to hand. You wish to make a cup of coffee

step.cmd: Bring a kettle of water to the boil
Place a coffee bag in an insulated glass
Pour hot water over the coffee bag until the glass is 80% full
Place the glass in a microwave oven and power for 30 seconds.
